title: Human Body Pose Estimation for Gait Identification: A Comprehensive Survey of Datasets and Models. (arXiv:2305.13765v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Person identification is a problem that has received substantial attention, particularly in security domains. Gait recognition is one of the most convenient approaches enabling person identification at a distance without the need of high-quality images. There are several review studies addressing person identification such as the utilization of facial images, silhouette images, and wearable sensor. Despite skeleton-based person identification gaining popularity while overcoming the challenges of traditional approaches, existing survey studies lack the comprehensive review of skeleton-based approaches to gait identification. We present a detailed review of the human pose estimation and gait analysis that make the skeleton-based approaches possible. The study covers various types of related datasets, tools, methodologies, and evaluation metrics with associated challenges, limitations, and application domains. translated_title: 人体姿态估计用于步态辨识：数据集与模型综述
translated_abstract: 个人辨识是一个受到广泛关注的问题，尤其是在安全领域。步态识别是最方便的方法之一，可以在远距离识别个人而无需高质量的图像。虽然骨架为基础的人物识别正越来越受欢迎，而且能够克服传统方法所面临的挑战，但现有的综述研究缺乏对骨架为基础的步态辨识方法的综合评估。我们对人体姿态估计和步态分析进行了详细的综述，阐述了骨架为基础的步态辨识的方法。该研究涵盖相关数据集、工具、方法论和评估指标的各种类型，以及相关挑战、限制和应用领域。针对每个方面都进行了详细的比较，并提出了未来研究的建议。
tldr: 本文对人体姿态估计和步态分析进行了综述，探讨了骨架为基础的步态辨识方法。详细介绍了相关数据集、工具、方法和评估指标，并提出了未来研究的建议。
en_tdlr: This paper provides a comprehensive review of skeleton-based approaches to gait identification, covering related datasets, tools, methodologies, and evaluation metrics. The study presents detailed comparisons and provides recommendations for future research.
